name: Soft ☆ Halloween
description:
Soft ☆ Halloween is an Arcade game released especially for Halloween 2019 as part of Horror Humor Jam.

The game is all about Soft, a mix of  rabbit and vegetable who had his night ruined because of monsters that have invaded the forest.  Here's a game that mixes humor, horror and cuteness in one place.

------------------------------------------------------
☆ THE TEAM ☆
------------------------------------------------------

Game by: Pixl Void

Director: Pixl Void

Designers: Pixl Void and RATS 

Art: Pixl Void and RATS

Music: Koala Sonora

SFX: Pixl Void and Koala Sonora

Beta Tester: Docinho Espacial

Font: kongtext by codeman38
